item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: You‚Äôre building a community for your rollup, and that community wants data. Give it to them by integrating with Nansen!
Find it on Conduit Marketplace https://www.conduit.xyz/marketplace
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
You‚Äôre building a community for your rollup, and that community wants data. Give it to them by integrating with Nansen!

Find it on Conduit Marketplace conduit.xyz/marketplace

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: It‚Äôs not just investors who can benefit from Nansen.
Your team can also use Nansen to learn what your target users are doing onchain, identify new growth areas, and manage risk.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
It‚Äôs not just investors who can benefit from Nansen.

Your team can also use Nansen to learn what your target users are doing onchain, identify new growth areas, and manage risk.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Why do investors go to Nansen? Because Nansen separates the signal from the noise.
Nansen takes onchain data and turns it into dashboards filled with insights on everything from hot contracts to what Smart Money is doing.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Why do investors go to Nansen? Because Nansen separates the signal from the noise.

Nansen takes onchain data and turns it into dashboards filled with insights on everything from hot contracts to what Smart Money is doing.

item.title:
One of the biggest names in onchain data is on Conduit Marketplace: @nansen_ai
Active investors are on Nansen. You can attract those investors by integrating your chain with Nansen and feeding data to the platform.
Give a little data, get a lot of liquidity. A fair trade, no?
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
One of the biggest names in onchain data is on Conduit Marketplace: @nansen_ai

Give a little data, get a lot of liquidity. A fair trade, no?

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Read the full report to get more data like this, the ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind the data, predictions on the future of rollups, and more. https://www.conduit.xyz/blog/2025-state-of-rollups/
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Read the full report to get more data like this, the ‚Äúwhy‚Äù behind the data, predictions on the future of rollups, and more. conduit.xyz/blog/2025-state-‚Ä¶

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: We see a similar pattern for the L2 vs. L3 question. With a few exceptions, most segments lean heavily one way or the other.
DEXs, NFTs, and payments favor L2, while Gaming, AI, and social lean L3.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
We see a similar pattern for the L2 vs. L3 question. With a few exceptions, most segments lean heavily one way or the other.

DEXs, NFTs, and payments favor L2, while Gaming, AI, and social lean L3.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: The answer depends on the rollup‚Äôs use case
Example: One crucial early question for rollups is @Optimism OP Stack vs @Arbitrum Orbit
The data shows that builders in segments like gaming and onchain infra favor Arbitrum, while others like AI, NFTs, and payments favor OP Stack
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
The answer depends on the rollup‚Äôs use case

Example: One crucial early question for rollups is @Optimism OP Stack vs @Arbitrum Orbit

The data shows that builders in segments like gaming and onchain infra favor Arbitrum, while others like AI, NFTs, and payments favor OP Stack

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: But there are so many rollup components, across both the core tech stack and ancillary tooling for important functionalities.
Which components are teams using the most? And how do they decide which to use?
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
But there are so many rollup components, across both the core tech stack and ancillary tooling for important functionalities.

Which components are teams using the most? And how do they decide which to use?

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: Rollups are scaling Ethereum and shaping it into the world computer it‚Äôs meant to be.
Teams are building games, social networks, consumer apps, and more on rollups because they get throughput Ethereum mainnet can‚Äôt provide, while maintaining decentralization.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Rollups are scaling Ethereum and shaping it into the world computer it‚Äôs meant to be.

Teams are building games, social networks, consumer apps, and more on rollups because they get throughput Ethereum mainnet can‚Äôt provide, while maintaining decentralization.

item.title:
Conduit‚Äôs 2025 State of Rollups Report is out today. Inside, you‚Äôll find:
Data on which infra components are most widely used and how that differs by use case Insights from projects like @ProofOfPlay, @derivexyz, and @zora Predictions for the future And more!
Preview below üëá
